mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (customer_no, customer_id, customer_password, customer_name_kor, customer_name_eng, customer_email, customer_phone, customer_gender, customer_passport_no) VALUES (#{customerNo}, #{customerId}, #{customerPassword}, #{customerNameKor}, #{customerNameEng}, #{customerEmail}, #{customerPhone}, #{customerGender}, #{customerPassportNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE customer SET customer_name_kor = #{customerNameKor}, customer_name_eng = #{customerNameEng}, customer_passport_no = #{customerPassportNo}, customer_gender = #{customerGender}, customer_phone = #{customerPhone}, customer_email = #{customerEmail} WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}
